items.preText: India need 45 off 54 Wrivu: "A couple of big hits from sir jadeja will change the match. Is it worth the risk though?" --- from an Indian perspective, not till the 45th over atleast
items.text: length ball on off. Angling into Bhuvi, and he muscles a straight drive to long on
darter on middle stump, that skids through to Jadeja. Nudged off his pads to midwicket
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Jadeja, no run

items.text: full and wide outside off stump, and Jadeja sticks his bat out to steer a square drive past the fielder at point. Calls early for the second run
items.postText: Ajmal Khan: "This Asia Cup has been like World Cup experience for me. What an amazing event was this, with heaps of upsets right from the crash landing of SL, to the mighty show of Afghanistan and the predictably unpredictable performance by Pakistan, and to this final match, where fans on both sides are having episodes of adrenaline and no-adrenaline. "

items.preText: MPal: "Dhawan was supposed to make 40-50 runs, but he was short by 25-35 runs, I think that might be the margin India may lose " -- and remember, Bangladesh batted nine deliveries less than their 50-over quota.
items.text: full just outside off, and he drills a straight drive past the bowler! Nazmul tried to get his hands to it, but he cannot stop the ball, and the umpire skips over the ball to let it go through to the long-off boundary
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Jadeja, FOUR runs

items.text: good length on off, and punched off the back foot to mid on
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Jadeja, no run

items.text: full just outside off stump. Uses his feet to get to the pitch of the ball. Taps it down to long on and keeps the strike

items.preText: Pressure on the faces of fans from both sides. Nervous energy all around the Dubai Sports Club. India need 37 off 48. Bangladesh need Rubel to strike ASAP.
items.text: length ball on middle, and Jadeja defends with soft hands towards point. Carefully played
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Jadeja, no run

items.text: length ball on leg, and Jadeja charges down the wicket. Punches this with the straight bat, and Rubel bends down to stop the ball from going past him. Another dot
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Jadeja, no run

items.text: good length just outside off. Angling away from Jadeja, and he plays the late cut to third man for one
items.postText: Santanu : "Somehow i think playing Asia cup in 'neutral' venues madenit more interesting. Not only pitch, but the weather, crowd, everything a little foreign to each team."

items.text: full on off, and aimed at the stumps. Bhuvi blocks off the back foot, and the ball rolls down to mid on
items.postText: Edmund: "Who are the locals supporting? Surely Bangladesh?" -- 65% India, 35% Bangladesh
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Kumar, no run

items.preText: delay in proceedings. Mashrafe tinkering with the field.
items.text: back of a length outside off, and his back-foot punch takes an inside edge onto his body
items.postText: Tapan: "Mr. Commentator of ESPN don't forget to publish some Bangladesh fans comments." -- at your service, sir. Feeling nervous? Biting nails?
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Kumar, no run

items.text: full on off stump, and he whips this off his pads to midwicket. Can't pinch the single though. Mashrafe appealed for the lbw, but it was definitely bat first
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Kumar, no run

items.preText: India need 36 off 42. Mashrafe to bowl out.
items.text: good length on off, and to close to his body for the cut. Steered right to point
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Jadeja, no run

items.text: length ball outside off, and angling away from Jadeja. He slaps a cut past the cover-point fielder and jogs across for another single
items.postText: Arjuna : "What happens if there is a tie? " -- Super Over, sir. Yes, you read that right

items.text: good length on middle, and going down leg. Bhuvi looks to work it off his hips, but can't connect with the shot
full on off stump, and defended straight. Mashrafe was running to his left, but changes his direction and dives to his right to them stop the ball
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Kumar, no run

items.text: play and a miss. Short and wide outside off, and Bhuvi fails to connect with a square cut. The ball goes under his bat
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Kumar, no run

items.text: full outside off, and driven to short cover. But misfield from Liton means they can scamper across for one
items.postText: Aaron: "Will Jadhav to to Bangladesh what he did to MI with CSK?" -- and remember, it was Mustafizur who he scooped over fine leg for that match-winning six

items.text: good length on off stump, and punched off the back foot to mid on for a single. Mashrafe gives it his all, and he's on the ground in a bid to field the ball. That's the end of his spell
items.postText: "When was the last time a team had 2 ties back to back? " -- that's never happened, Mohit Rathore

items.text: good length from around the wicket. Lands on middle, and Jadeja makes room to punch down the ground
full outside off, and Bhuvi backs away to lift a drive right over the infield. Chipped, really, and that's enough for India to collect a double

items.preText: Fab: "When was the last time did Bangladesh won an ICC tournament?? " -- the men have never won, but the women won the 2018 Asia Cup beating India. And this is technically an ACC tournament.
items.text: good length on middle, and he mistimes a pull past square leg. Just a single this time
good length on middle, but angling down leg. Whipped off his pads to deep square leg. They're rotating the strike with ease now
flat on middle, and he clips it off his pads to the fielder at short fine leg
full on off, and his leg-side tap takes a leading edge towards the bowler. No run
items.postText: Saad : "Strange bowling changes by Mashrafe" -- yep, six taken off this over.
